name: Bingo Lane Mobile
description:
***Download the #1 bingo game for FREE today!***

With over 1 million players and over 10,000 five star reviews worldwide, Bingo Lane Mobile is the best place to enjoy FREE Bingo on your iPhone or iPod Touch.

Bingo Lane Mobile offers a multiplayer bingo experience like no other so DOWNLOAD BINGO LANE NOW!

*** UNIQUE FEATURES ***
Bingo Lane Mobile is home of the Wonderballs - animated characters that add a fun and exciting twist to Bingo Lane!

*** DIFFERENT THEMED ROOMS ***
Our variety of themed rooms offer you new locations to play in: new bingo callers, seasonal rooms, unique Wonderballs, and a huge set of items to collect.

*** REGULAR TICKETS ***
With FREE tickets every 15 minutes, you’ll never have to wait long to play your next game of bingo.

*** ACHIEVE AND COLLECT ***
Each of our themes comes with a set of collections and fantastic rewards for completion.

*** SOCIALISE ***
Chat to your friends whilst playing bingo and help them by gifting them with coins, keys, and collectables!

*** SLOTS ***
WIN even more tickets by playing the Bingo Lane slots.

DOWNLOAD NOW IF YOU LOVE BINGO!

What people are saying about Bingo Lane:

" Can’t put it down, so much fun "
" Absolutely love it. So addictive.”
" Great bingo app with lots of unique features that others don’t have. Love it!”

Connect with Facebook to save your progress and share free coins with friends and like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Bingolane

Bingo Lane Mobile is a free to play game for entertainment use only, though additional in-app purchases are available so that you can top up your coin or ticket balance whenever you like.

Bingo Lane Mobile is intended for an adult audience.

Bingo Lane Mobile does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.

Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
